Description:
Oasis Event Door Limited - IN served re HSWA and COSHH

312390023
IN/DND23022022/01

You have failed to ensure that exposure to wood dust, a substance hazardous to health due to it being a potential cause of occupational asthma, is adequately controlled to as low a level as is reasonably practicable during activities which have a high potential for generating airborne wood dust, including sawing and cleaning.
